MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA6 postcode area of Ayr. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:45am to safely carry out repairs to an overhead line fault  and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:34am on Wednesday, 20 January 2021
